member.name: F:Penguin.FileStreams.FileStreamCompression.None
member.summary: Files are written as plain text

member.name: F:Penguin.FileStreams.FileStreamCompression.Gzip
member.summary: Files are wrapped in a Gzip stream

member.name: F:Penguin.FileStreams.FileStreamCompression.Zip
member.summary: Files are written directly into a Zip stream, which is closed on dispose
